source.sqlReaderQuery:
select sod.ProductID, sod.SalesOrderID, sod.OrderQty, sod.UnitPrice, soh.OrderDate, soh.CustomerID, soh.TaxAmt
from SalesLT.SalesOrderDetail sod
left join SalesLT.SalesOrderHeader soh
on sod.SalesOrderID = soh.SalesOrderID
